implementation.useCase: Assembled uses Claude to power 'Assist', their omnichannel AI agent and copilot that enhances support operations through dynamic ticket categorization, intelligent routing, real-time response generation, and multi-model architecture for enterprise customers.
implementation.problem: Modern support teams struggle to deliver personalized, high-quality service at massive scale, particularly for complex Tier 2+ issues that require analysis, actions, and empathy.
implementation.integrationMethod: Multi-model architecture enabling seamless failover during outages
implementation.implementationTime: Able to switch to Claude in 20 minutes during a critical outage

metrics.metric: Accuracy improvement across hundreds of categories for one major customer
metrics.sourceText: When agents modify AI-generated responses, the system analyzes these changes to continuously improve accuracy. This approach helped achieve dramatic improvements—for one major customer, accuracy jumped from 62% to 90% across hundreds of categories.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Able to maintain service during competitor outages
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: We moved all LLM workflows over to Claude in real time, which was huge for us because we could ride out a five to six hour outage without disrupting our customers

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Used Claude to train sales team on product knowledge
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: When we were using Claude internally, we used it extensively to help train our sales team on our product. Early on, our sales team was using the Claude Slack bot to answer product questions during sales calls.

qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: This was so effective that we now offer all employees a monthly LLM budget—they can choose any AI model, but many prefer Claude for its natural, empathetic interactions.

technicalDetails.architecture: Multi-model architecture enabling seamless failover during outages with secure failover architecture for enterprise reliability
technicalDetails.promptEngineering: Dynamic ticket categorization using meta-prompting that adapts to each customer's unique taxonomy
technicalDetails.challenges: Handling complex Tier 2+ support issues that require analysis, actions, and empathy; Maintaining service during competitor outages
technicalDetails.solutions: Sophisticated evaluation system to measure AI model performance; Every support agent response goes through evaluation to create a golden dataset for comparison; Analysis of agent modifications to AI-generated responses to continuously improve accuracy
technicalDetails.scale: Enterprise-level support operations for companies like Brooks, Warner Brothers, Robinhood, and Stripe
